name: Ive Got Peace Like River
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Verse]
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]G/F#[/ch]     [ch]G/E[/ch]
Ive got peace like a river x 3
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]G/F#[/ch]     [ch]G/E[/ch]
in my, soul
[ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]C[/ch]
come to the, river
[ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]C[/ch]
it will flow from his heart
[ch]G[/ch]                                        [ch]C[/ch]
when the leaves fall, whether they grow
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]G/F#[/ch]     [ch]G/E[/ch]
they will grow

[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]G/F#[/ch]     [ch]G/E[/ch]
Ive got love like an ocean x 3
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]G/F#[/ch]     [ch]G/E[/ch]
in my, soul
[ch]G[/ch]                       [ch]C[/ch]
come to the, waters
[ch]G[/ch]                        [ch]C[/ch]
watch it flow, with his love
[ch]G[/ch]                                           [ch]C[/ch]
where your heart wont, wither
[ch]G[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]
but grow
[ch]G[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]
it will grow.
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]G/F#[/ch]     [ch]G/E[/ch]
Ive got joy, like, a fountain x 3
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]G/F#[/ch]     [ch]G/E[/ch]
in my, soul
[ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]C[/ch]
come to the, fountain
[ch]G[/ch]                         [ch]C[/ch]
when his will, love from his heart
[ch]G[/ch]                                         [ch]C[/ch]
where your soul wont wither
[ch]G[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]
but grow

[ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]
come to the, river
[ch]G[/ch]                  [ch]C[/ch]
it will flow, from his heart
[ch]G[/ch]                                            [ch]C[/ch]
where the leaves wont, wither but grow
[ch]G[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]
they will grow

[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]G/F#[/ch]     [ch]G/E[/ch]
Ive got peace like a river
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]G/F#[/ch]     [ch]G/E[/ch]
Ive got love like an ocean
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]G/F#[/ch]     [ch]G/E[/ch]
Ive got joy, like, a fountain
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]G/F#[/ch]     [ch]G/E[/ch]
in my soul

[Outro]
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]G/F#[/ch]     [ch]G/E[/ch]

name: Angels We Have Heard On High

content.text:
ANGELS WE HAVE HEARD ON HIGH
Advent to Christmas
Page CXVI

KEY: Bbmajor
V1
[ch]Bb[/ch]
Angels we have heard on high Sweetly singing o’er the plains,
And the mountains in reply Echoing their joyous strains.
INST - [ch]Bb[/ch]

V2
[ch]Bb[/ch]                           [ch]Bb[/ch]
Shepherds, why this jubilee? Why your joyous strains prolong?
[ch]Gm[/ch]                [ch]Eb[/ch]         [ch]Bb[/ch]
What the gladsome tidings be Which inspire your heavenly song?

CH1
[ch]Bb[/ch]   [ch]F[/ch]   [ch]Bb[/ch]  [ch]F[/ch]    [ch]Gm[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]  [ch]Eb[/ch]
Glo  oh  oh  ria, in excelsis Deo!

V3
[ch]Bb[/ch]                        [ch]Bb[/ch]
Come to Bethlehem and see Christ Whose birth the angels sing;
[ch]Gm[/ch]             [ch]Eb[/ch]          [ch]Bb[/ch]
Come, adore on bended knee, Christ the Lord, the newborn King.

CH2
[ch]Bb[/ch]   [ch]F[/ch]   [ch]Gm[/ch]  [ch]F[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]   [ch]F[/ch]   [ch]Gm[/ch]   [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Gm[/ch]         [ch]F[/ch]  [ch]Eb[/ch]
Glo  oh  oh  ria,  Glo  oh  oh   ria,  in excelsis Deo!

V4
[ch]Bb[/ch]                        [ch]F[/ch]                   [ch]Gm[/ch]
See Him in a manger laid, Whom the choirs of angels praise; 
[ch]Eb[/ch]             [ch]Bb[/ch]            [ch]Eb[/ch]                  [ch]F[/ch]        [ch]Gm[/ch]        [ch]Bb[/ch]
Mary, Joseph, lend your aid, While our hearts in love we raise.

OUTRO/CH3
[ch]Eb[/ch]                  [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Gm[/ch]        [ch]Bb[/ch]
While our hearts in love we raise 
Glo        -       oh   -   oh   -   oria (6X)
While our hearts in love we raise (2X

(Gsus through first few verses)

[ch]Gsus[/ch]
Come thou fount of every blessing
Tune my heart to sing thy grace
Streams of mercy never ceasing
Call for songs of loudest praise

[ch]Gsus[/ch]
Teach me some melodious sonnet
Sung by ﬂaming tongues above
I'll praise the mount I'm ﬁxed upon it
Mount of thy redeeming love
 
[ch]Gsus[/ch]
Here I raise my Ebenezer
Hither by thy help I come
And I hope by thy good pleasure
Safely to arrive at home


       [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]
Jesus sought me when a stranger
           [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
Wondering from the fold of God
[ch]G[/ch]
He, to rescue me from danger
Interposed His precious blood


[ch]G[/ch]                       [ch]D[/ch]
O to grace how great a debtor 
       [ch]C[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]
daily I'm constrained to be!
         [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]
Let thy goodness like a fetter, 
         [ch]C[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]
bind my wandering heart to thee

[ch]Gsus[/ch]
Prone to wander Lord I feel it, 
prone to leave the God I love
           [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]
Here's my heart, O take and seal it, 
        [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]
seal it for thy courts above

       [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]
I am bound for the kingdom
                [ch]Em[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
Wonʼt you come with me (2X)

       [ch]Am[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]
I am bound for the kingdom
                [ch]Em[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
Wonʼt you come with me (2X)

[ch]F[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]
Hallelujah we sing (3X)

[Intro]
[ch]C[/ch] [ch]F[/ch] 


[Verse]
[ch]C[/ch]
Deep and wide,
[ch]F[/ch]     
deep and wide,
          [ch]C[/ch]
there's a fountain
                      [ch]G[/ch]
flowing deep and wide.     

[ch]C[/ch]
Deep and wide,
[ch]F[/ch]     
deep and wide,
          [ch]C[/ch]
there's a fountain
[ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]C[/ch]
flowing deep and wide.


[Bridge]
[ch]C[/ch]
I went down to the river to pray, 
            [ch]F[/ch]
studying about that good ol' way
        [ch]C[/ch]
O, and who shall wear that robe and crown,
         [ch]F[/ch]
Oh good Lord, show me the way

[ch]C[/ch]
I went down to the river to pray, 
              [ch]F[/ch]
studying about that good ol' way
        [ch]C[/ch]
O, and who shall wear that starry crown,
         [ch]F[/ch]
Oh good Lord, show me the way



[Chorus]
[ch]G[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]
Oh, sister let's go down,
[ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]
down to the river oh, come on down.
[ch]G[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]
Oh sister let's go down, 
[ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]C[/ch]
down to the river to pray


[Verse]
[ch]C[/ch]
Deep and wide,
[ch]F[/ch]     
deep and wide,
          [ch]C[/ch]
there's a fountain
                    [ch]G[/ch]
flowing deep and wide.     

[ch]C[/ch]
Deep and wide,
[ch]F[/ch]     
deep and wide,
          [ch]C[/ch]
there's a fountain
[ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]
flowing deep and wide.




[Chorus]
[ch]G[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]
Oh, sister let's go down,
[ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]
down to the river oh, come on down.
[ch]G[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]
Oh brother let's go down, 
[ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]C[/ch]
down to the river to pray
[ch]G[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]
Oh, mother let's go down,
[ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]
down to the river oh, come on down.
[ch]G[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]
Oh mother let's go down, 
[ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]C[/ch]
down to the river to pray



[Outro]

[ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]C[/ch]
down to the river to pray

[ch]C[/ch]

name: Fast From Feast On
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Verse 1]
[ch]F[/ch]        [ch]F/C[/ch]           [ch]F/D[/ch]
 Fast from the swelling darkness,
[ch]Bb[/ch]            [ch]F/C[/ch]               [ch]F/D[/ch]
 Feast on the power of his light
[ch]F[/ch]        [ch]F/C[/ch]     [ch]F/D[/ch]
 Fast from discontentment,
[ch]Bb[/ch]            [ch]F/C[/ch]             [ch]F/D[/ch]
 Feast on the joy that he brings

[Chorus]
 [ch]Bb[/ch]           [ch]Gm[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch]            [ch]Bb[/ch]
Sustainer, Protector, the Well of Life
   [ch]Bb[/ch]         [ch]Gm[/ch]           [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]Gm[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]Gm[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]
My Helper, My comfort, the bread of life is you-oo-ooo is you-oo-ooo

[Verse 2]
[ch]F[/ch]         [ch]F/C[/ch]             [ch]F/D[/ch]
 Fast from the fear that haunts us,
[ch]Bb[/ch]           [ch]F/C[/ch]              [ch]F/D[/ch]
 Feast on the power of his might
[ch]F[/ch]          [ch]F/C[/ch]         [ch]F/D[/ch]
 Fast from the trap of judgment,
[ch]Bb[/ch]      [ch]F/C[/ch]                       [ch]F/D[/ch]
 Feast on all that's been redeemed

[Chorus]
 [ch]Bb[/ch]           [ch]Gm[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch]            [ch]Bb[/ch]
Sustainer, Protector, the Well of Life
   [ch]Bb[/ch]         [ch]Gm[/ch]           [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]Gm[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]Gm[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]
My Helper, My comfort, the bread of life is you-oo-ooo is you-oo-ooo

[Bridge]
[ch]Cm[/ch]        [ch]Gm[/ch]             [ch]Bb[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]
 From the sorrow's shadow to perfect light
[ch]Cm[/ch]        [ch]Gm[/ch]                [ch]Bb[/ch]                  [ch]F[/ch]
 From the darkness of our doubt to a cleansing white
[ch]Cm[/ch]        [ch]Gm[/ch]             [ch]Bb[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]
 From the sorrow's shadow to perfect light
[ch]Cm[/ch]        [ch]Gm[/ch]                 [ch]Bb[/ch]             [ch]F[/ch]
 From the blindness of our sin to healing sight

[Chorus]
 [ch]Bb[/ch]           [ch]Gm[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch]            [ch]Bb[/ch]
Sustainer, Protector, the Well of Life
   [ch]Bb[/ch]         [ch]Gm[/ch]           [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]Gm[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]Gm[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]
My Helper, My comfort, the bread of life is you-oo-ooo is you-oo-ooo
 [ch]Bb[/ch]           [ch]Gm[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch]            [ch]Bb[/ch]
Sustainer, Protector, the Well of Life
   [ch]Bb[/ch]         [ch]Gm[/ch]           [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]Gm[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]Gm[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]
My Helper, My comfort, the bread of life is you-oo-ooo is you-oo-ooo

name: How Deep The Fathers Love For Us

content.text:
[ch]C[/ch]                [ch]C/F[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]
How deep the Father’s love for us
     [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]C/F[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]
How vast beyond all measure
     [ch]Am[/ch]                 [ch]C/F[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]
That He should give His only Son
    [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]F[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]
To make a wretch His treasure


      [ch]Dm[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]
Your wounds have paid, your wounds have paid
      [ch]Dm[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
your wounds have paid, they have paved the way.

Inst: C-Dm-Am-G

    [ch]C[/ch]                 [ch]C/F[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]
How great the pain of searing loss,
     [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]C/F[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]
The Father turns His face away
    [ch]Am[/ch]                   [ch]C/F[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]   
As wounds which mar the chosen One,
[ch]G[/ch]     [ch]Am[/ch]         [ch]F[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]  
Bring us sons to glory.

Chorus

   [ch]Dm[/ch]           [ch]C/F[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]
Behold the Man upon a cross,
   [ch]Dm[/ch]           [ch]C/F[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]
My sin upon His shoulders
  [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]F[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]    
Ashamed I hear my mocking voice,
     [ch]Am[/ch]            [ch]F[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]
Call out among the scoffers

         [ch]Dm[/ch]                 [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]
You've renewed this marred heart, after all it has done
         [ch]Dm[/ch]               [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]
With the wounds you have bled for me.

[Intro]
[ch]Eb[/ch]-[ch]C[/ch]-[ch]Ab[/ch] (2x)

[Verse 1]
   [ch]Eb[/ch]
He heard my cries,
   [ch]Cm[/ch]           [ch]Ab[/ch]      [ch]Cm[/ch]        [ch]Bb[/ch]         [ch]Eb[/ch]
He bowed his ear and    chased my griefs away
  [ch]Eb[/ch]              [ch]Cm[/ch]          [ch]Ab[/ch]
O let my heart no more despair
      [ch]Cm[/ch]          [ch]Bb[/ch]   [ch]Cm[/ch]
While I have breath    breath to pray

[Chorus]
  [ch]Ab[/ch]                   [ch]Eb[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch]
I love The Lord     He chased my griefs away
   [ch]Ab[/ch]                   [ch]Eb[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]
Despair no more     and use this breath to pray (2x)
   [ch]Ab[/ch]-[ch]Eb[/ch]-[ch]F[/ch] [ch]Ab[/ch]-[ch]Eb[/ch]-[ch]F[/ch]
To pray to pray (2x)

[Instrumental]
[ch]Eb[/ch]-[ch]C[/ch]-[ch]Ab[/ch] (2x)

[Verse 2]
   [ch]Eb[/ch]                 [ch]Cm[/ch]          [ch]Ab[/ch]
My flesh declined, my spirits fell
    [ch]Cm[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]Eb[/ch]
And I drew near the dead
  [ch]Eb[/ch]              [ch]Cm[/ch]          [ch]Ab[/ch]
Return my soul to God thy rest
              [ch]Cm[/ch]   [ch]Bb[/ch]  [ch]Cm[/ch]
for thou hast known    known His love

[Chorus]
  [ch]Ab[/ch]                   [ch]Eb[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch]
I love The Lord     He chased my griefs away
   [ch]Ab[/ch]                   [ch]Eb[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]
Despair no more     and use this breath to pray (2x)
   [ch]Ab[/ch]-[ch]Eb[/ch]-[ch]F[/ch] [ch]Ab[/ch]-[ch]Eb[/ch]-[ch]F[/ch]
To pray to pray (2x)

[Bridge]
   [ch]Ab[/ch]              [ch]Cm[/ch]          [ch]Eb[/ch]
My God I cried thy servant save
     [ch]Ab[/ch]      [ch]Cm[/ch]            [ch]Eb[/ch]
Thy power can    rescue me from the grave (2x)

[Verse 3]
   [ch]Eb[/ch]                [ch]Cm[/ch]             [ch]Ab[/ch]       [ch]Cm[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]      [ch]Eb[/ch]
My God hath saved my soul from death     and dried my falling tears
   [ch]Eb[/ch]                  [ch]Cm[/ch]             [ch]Ab[/ch]   [ch]Cm[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]  [ch]Cm[/ch]
Now to His praise I'll spend my breath and my remain, remaining years

[Chorus]
  [ch]Ab[/ch]                   [ch]Eb[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch]
I love The Lord     He chased my griefs away
   [ch]Ab[/ch]                   [ch]Eb[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]
Despair no more     and use this breath to pray (2x)
   [ch]Ab[/ch]-[ch]Eb[/ch]-[ch]F[/ch] [ch]Ab[/ch]-[ch]Eb[/ch]-[ch]F[/ch]
To pray to pray (2x)

name: In Christ Alone
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Verse 1]
           [ch]Am[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
In Christ alone my hope is found
           [ch]F[/ch]    -     [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Am[/ch]
He is my light, my strength, my song
            [ch]Am[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]
This Cornerstone, this solid ground
                   [ch]F[/ch]    -    [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]Am[/ch]     /     /     /
Firm through the fiercest drought and storm

[Chorus]
                  [ch]F[/ch]                    [ch]G[/ch]
What heights of love, what depths of peace
                  [ch]Am[/ch]                     [ch]G[/ch]
When fears are stilled, when strivings cease
          [ch]F[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
My Comforter, my All in All
             [ch]F[/ch]    -    [ch]G[/ch]      ([ch]Am[/ch])
Here in the love of Christ I stand

[Instrumental]
[ch]Am[/ch]  -  [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]F[/ch]  -  [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch]  -  [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]F[/ch]  -  [ch]G[/ch]

[Verse 2]
           [ch]Am[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]
In Christ alone, who took on flesh
             [ch]F[/ch]  -   [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]
Fullness of God in helpless babe
              [ch]Am[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
This gift of love and righteousness
                [ch]F[/ch]   -    [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]Am[/ch]
Scorned by the ones He came to save

[Chorus 2]
                [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]
'Til on that cross as Jesus died
             [ch]Am[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]
The wrath of God was satisfied
                [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]
'Til on that cross as Jesus died
             [ch]Am[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]
The wrath of God was satisfied
           [ch]F[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
For every sin on Him was laid
              [ch]F[/ch]    -   [ch]G[/ch]      ([ch]Am[/ch])
Here in the death of Christ I live

[Instrumental]
[ch]Am[/ch]  -  [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]F[/ch]  -  [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch]  -  [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]F[/ch]  -  [ch]G[/ch]


[Verse 3]
               [ch]Am[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]
There in the ground His body lay
               [ch]F[/ch]   -   [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]
Light of the world by darkness slain
               [ch]Am[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
Then bursting forth in glorious day
              [ch]F[/ch]   -   [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch]
Up from the grave He rose again

[Chorus 3]
            [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]
And as He stands in victory
                 [ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]
Sin's curse has lost it's grip on me
            [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]
And as He stands in victory
                 [ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]
Sin's curse has lost it's grip on me
         [ch]Am[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]
For I am His and He is mine
                   [ch]F[/ch]   -    [ch]G[/ch]       ([ch]Am[/ch])
Brought with the precious blood of Christ

[Instrumental]
[ch]Am[/ch]  -  [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]F[/ch]  -  [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch]  -  [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]F[/ch]  -  [ch]G[/ch]

[Outro]
[ch]C[/ch]      -     [ch]D/G[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]          -            [ch]G[/ch]
 No guilt in life, no fear in death, from life's first cry to final breath
[ch]C[/ch]      -     [ch]D/G[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]          -            [ch]G[/ch]
 No guilt in life, no fear in death, from life's first cry to final breath

[ch]C[/ch]      -     [ch]D/G[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]          -            [ch]G[/ch]
 No guilt in life, no fear in death, from life's first cry to final breath
[ch]C[/ch]      -     [ch]D/G[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]          -            [ch]G[/ch]
 No guilt in life, no fear in death, from life's first cry to final breath

[ch]C[/ch]      -     [ch]D/G[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]          -            [ch]G[/ch]
 No guilt in life, no fear in death, from life's first cry to final breath
[ch]C[/ch]      -     [ch]D/G[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]          -            [ch]G[/ch]
 No guilt in life, no fear in death, from life's first cry to final breath

Joy
Page CXVI
                  [ch]Cm[/ch]                    [ch]Cm/Bb[/ch]
Iʼve got the joy, joy, joy, joy down in my heart
[ch]Cm/Ab[/ch]               [ch]Fm[/ch]
down in my heart
V2 (2X)
                  [ch]Cm[/ch]           [ch]Cm/Bb[/ch]             [ch]Cm/Ab[/ch]      [ch]Fm[/ch]
And Iʼm so happy, so happy, so very happy
V1 (2X)
V2 (2X)
V3
[ch]Cm[/ch]
And I canʼt understand
[ch]Cm/Bb[/ch]
And I canʼt pretend
[ch]Cm/Ab[/ch]                  [ch]Fm[/ch]
That this will be alright in the end
[ch]Cm[/ch]
So Iʼll try my best
[ch]Cm/Bb[/ch]
And lift up my chest
[ch]Cm/Ab[/ch]          [ch]Fm[/ch]    [ch]Cm[/ch] [ch]Cm/Bb[/ch] [ch]Cm/Ab[/ch]    [ch]Fm[/ch]
To sing about this…joy, joy,      joy
V4
[ch]Cm[/ch]                        [ch]Cm/Bb[/ch]   [ch]Cm/Ab[/ch]           [ch]Fm[/ch]
When peace like a river       attendeth my way
[ch]Cm[/ch]                       [ch]Cm/Bb[/ch]        [ch]Bb[/ch]
When sorrows like sea billows roll
         [ch]Eb[/ch]         [ch]Ab[/ch]                        [ch]Fm[/ch]                [ch]Bb[/ch]
What ever my lot         thou has taught me to say
      [ch]Eb[/ch]           [ch]Ab[/ch]                 [ch]Eb[/ch]
It is well, it is well, with my soul

(2X)
[ch]C[/ch]
What can wash away my sin?

[ch]B[/ch]              [ch]E[/ch]           [ch]G#m[/ch]                   [ch]F#M[/ch]   [ch]E[/ch]

[ch]B[/ch]          [ch]E[/ch]               [ch]G#m[/ch]                     [ch]F#M[/ch]   [ch]E[/ch]

[ch]B[/ch]          [ch]E[/ch]     [ch]G#m[/ch]                    [ch]F#M[/ch]  
All ye who hear, now to His temple draw near;

[ch]E[/ch] [ch]B[/ch] [ch]F#M[/ch]   (2X)

[ch]B[/ch]             [ch]E[/ch]              [ch]G#m[/ch]                    [ch]F#M[/ch]   [ch]E[/ch]

[ch]B[/ch]                 [ch]E[/ch]               [ch]G#m[/ch]                      [ch]F#M[/ch]  [ch]E[/ch]
Health hath vouch safed and, when heedlessly falling, hath stayed thee.
[ch]B[/ch]             [ch]E[/ch]    [ch]G#m[/ch]                   [ch]F#M[/ch]  
What need or grief ever hath failed of relief?

[ch]D[/ch]                           [ch]A[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]

[ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]

[ch]A[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch]

[ch]D[/ch]                         [ch]A[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]

[ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]                          [ch]D[/ch]
Glories stream from heaven afar, Heavenly hosts singing Alleluia!
[ch]A[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]   [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]A[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]

[ch]A[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]   [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]A[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch]

name: Solid Rock
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Verse]
    [ch]Gm[/ch]                [ch]Gm/F[/ch]               [ch]Eb[/ch]             [ch]Bb[/ch]
My hope is built on nothing less Than Jesus' blood and righteousness;
    [ch]Gm[/ch]                [ch]Gm/F[/ch]               [ch]Eb[/ch]             [ch]Bb[/ch]
I dare not trust the sweetest frame, But wholly lean on Jesus' name.

      [ch]Gm[/ch]              [ch]Eb[/ch]                  [ch]Gm[/ch]                [ch]Bb[/ch]    [ch]F[/ch]
On Christ, the solid Rock, I stand; All other ground is sinking sand.
      [ch]Gm[/ch]                 [ch]F[/ch]    [ch]Gm[/ch]
All other ground is sinking sand.

8 bars 
[ch]Gm[/ch] [ch]Gm/F[/ch] [ch]Eb[/ch] [ch]Bb[/ch]

      [ch]Gm[/ch]                [ch]Gm/F[/ch]            [ch]Eb[/ch]             [ch]Bb[/ch]
When darkness veils His lovely face, I rest on His unchanging grace;
    [ch]Gm[/ch]             [ch]Gm/F[/ch]            [ch]Eb[/ch]             [ch]Bb[/ch]
In every high and stormy gale My anchor holds within the veil.

      [ch]Gm[/ch]              [ch]Eb[/ch]                  [ch]Gm[/ch]                [ch]Bb[/ch]    [ch]F[/ch]
On Christ, the solid Rock, I stand; All other ground is sinking sand.
      [ch]Gm[/ch]                 [ch]F[/ch]    [ch]Gm[/ch]
All other ground is sinking sand.

8 bars 
[ch]Gm[/ch] [ch]Gm/F[/ch] [ch]Eb[/ch] [ch]Bb[/ch]

    [ch]Gm[/ch]            [ch]Gm/F[/ch]               [ch]Eb[/ch]             [ch]Bb[/ch]
His oath, His covenant, and blood Support me in the whelming flood;
       [ch]Gm[/ch]           [ch]Gm/F[/ch]               [ch]Eb[/ch]             [ch]Bb[/ch]
When every earthly prop gives way, He then is all my Hope and Stay.

      [ch]Gm[/ch]              [ch]Eb[/ch]                  [ch]Gm[/ch]                [ch]Bb[/ch]    [ch]F[/ch]
On Christ, the solid Rock, I stand; All other ground is sinking sand.
      [ch]Gm[/ch]                 [ch]F[/ch]    [ch]Gm[/ch]
All other ground is sinking sand.

      [ch]Gm[/ch]                 [ch]Gm/F[/ch]               [ch]Eb[/ch]            [ch]Bb[/ch]
When He shall come with trumpet sound, Oh, may I then in Him be found,
        [ch]Gm[/ch]               [ch]Gm/F[/ch]             [ch]Eb[/ch]               [ch]Bb[/ch]
Clothed in His righteousness alone, Faultless to stand before the throne!

      [ch]Gm[/ch]              [ch]Eb[/ch]                  [ch]Gm[/ch]                [ch]Bb[/ch]    [ch]F[/ch]
On Christ, the solid Rock, I stand; All other ground is sinking sand.
      [ch]Gm[/ch]                 [ch]F[/ch]    [ch]Gm[/ch]
All other ground is sinking sand.

8 bars 
[ch]Gm[/ch] [ch]Gm/F[/ch] [ch]Eb[/ch] [ch]Bb[/ch]

[Outro]
     [ch]Gm[/ch]              [ch]Gm/F[/ch]                [ch]Eb[/ch]                     [ch]Bb[/ch]
On Christ, the solid Rock, I stand; All other ground is sinking sand.

name: Wash Me Clean
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Chorus]
 [ch]F[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Bb[/ch]  [ch]Eb[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]Bb[/ch]
Wash me clean In the warm sun dry me
[ch]F[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Bb[/ch]   [ch]Eb[/ch]   [ch]D[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]
Cleanse my heart From all iniquity
 [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]Bb[/ch]  [ch]Eb[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]Bb[/ch]
Baptize me In the Holy Spirit sea
[ch]F[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]   [ch]Bb[/ch]   [ch]Eb[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]Bb[/ch]
Renew my mind That wickedness may flee


[Verse 1]
[ch]Bb[/ch]            [ch]Eb[/ch]      [ch]F[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]
In those days His Son will save
[ch]Eb[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]    [ch]Bb[/ch]      [ch]Eb[/ch]      [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]Bb[/ch]
His Spirit will pour On all who call on the Lord
[ch]Bb[/ch]            [ch]Eb[/ch]      [ch]F[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]
In those days His Son will save
[ch]Eb[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]    [ch]Bb[/ch]      [ch]Eb[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]          [ch]Bb[/ch]
His Spirit will fill Empty jars of mud and clay


[Verse 2]
          [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]Eb[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]Bb[/ch]
In these days Barren fields will sprout trees
              [ch]Eb[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]Bb[/ch]
The deaf and blind will hear and see
               [ch]Eb[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]
The dead will raise and begin to breathe
               [ch]Eb[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]
The dead will raise and begin to breathe
                [ch]Eb[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]
The earth will groan in pain to see
        [ch]Eb[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]                 [ch]Eb[/ch]      [ch]F[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]
The sons of God declare to be His full and glorious family
                 [ch]Eb[/ch]      [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]
The beautiful, perfect bride of Thee


[Outro]

[ch]Bb[/ch]
